title: Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san - Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

episodes.description: Kiyo, the Maiko House live-in cook, sees her friend Sumire accompanying older maiko. Sumire's dedication soon leads to her debut as a maiko, and she runs to share her excitement with Kiyo.
episodes.subtitle: Chapter 1: Kiyo and Sumire
episodes.title: Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san - Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House -

episodes.description: Sumire struggles to fall asleep on an unfamiliar pillow after having her hair styled for the first time in a traditional maiko bun. Sleepless, she finds Kiyo waiting for her in the kitchen.
episodes.subtitle: Chapter 4: For Sleepless Nights
episodes.title: Maiko-san Chi no Makanai-san - Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House -
